wikipedia_page.main: Anna Konstam (22 February 1914 – 21 November 1982) was a British theatre and film actress.She appeared in the comedy Love in a Mist at St Martin's Theatre in 1941. She also played roles at Stratford in 1942-43, including Desdemona in Othello, Olivia in Twelfth Night and Hermione in The Winter's Tale.
